00021 /*** AudioVibratorDevice class is used to control Vibrator only for E-Gold based platforms
00022  * On all other platforms use the VibratorDevice class. 
00023  * VibratorDevice class unlike the AudioVibratorDevice class is not part of ApoxiAudio.
00024  * Refer to Vibrator device reference manual
00025  */

00029

00037             VibratorModeAsync1,

00043             VibratorModeSync1,
00045             VibratorModeSync2
00046         };

00048         //TODO: Are these sensible default values? Murray.

00058
